answers.answer: Take Tylenol and relax and try to stay in a dark room
Me also, I just took a Tylenol && my head is still hurting Kinda bad anything els we can take??

Tylenol does not work for me.  Try to keep hydrated.  I had a terrible headache all night but once I got up and had a glass of water it went away.  Also if your house is very dry try a humidifier.  I tend to get headaches from dry air as well.
Please tell your doc....could be a sign of something more serious like High Blood Pressure or Preeclampsia or perhaps just due to normal hormonal changes...good to know which.
Thanks everyone! Doctor is having me take allergy medication to see if that will help relieve the headaches.  So far they haven't but it is only day 3 for me taking Zyrtec.

question: i hardly if ever have gotten headaches I my life, well except self indulgence ones on the weekends, but I have been getting them a lot lately.  I have even woke up in the middle of the night with a pounding headache.  I am almost 15 weeks along.  Any one else experience this or have any suggestions?
title: Heacaches
